0: RESOLUTION TO RESPECTFULLY REQUEST THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) THROUGH THE BUREAU OF SOILS AND WATER MANAGEMENT AND THE DA-CORDILLERA ADMINISTRATIVE REGION (DA-CAR) TO CONDUCT A STUDY ON WHY THE SWEET POTATOES IN MOUNTAIN PROVINCE AND OTHER PARTS OF NORTH LUZON ARE SLOWLY DIMINISHING
